snippet.title: Light Odyssey - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Here's your look at formidable bosses and action-packed gameplay of Light Odyssey in this latest trailer for the upcoming Boss-Rush action game. Light Odyssey will be available on PC in 2024. In Light Odyssey, explore the ruins of an ancient fallen civilization, challenge the Colossus, and fight to restore light to the world.
